version_description:
NEW ‘FONT MISSING’ DIALOG
Adobe XD 1.1 includes a new ‘Font Missing’ dialog to explain issues with fonts, such as:
1) The font is missing on desktop
2) Certain font vendors do not allow for the transfer, display or distribution of their fonts
3) The font is not supported by XD on mobile (e.g. PostScript type 1 fonts)
OTHER FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
Version 1.1 also includes several bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• A redesigned interface and improved user experience
• Offline usage for XD documents stored in Creative Cloud
• Share and access prototype URLs
• Facebook and Google authentication support
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Optimized for iPhone X

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• We’ve added support for Typekit on mobile! XD documents loaded from Creative Cloud will automatically find and sync any Typekit fonts used in the document.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thanks for using XD! We update our app regularly to make your experience even better. Every month’s update includes improvements in speed and reliability. In addition to that, the September 2018 (12.0) Update of Adobe XD includes:
- Support for Timed Transitions
- Support for Responsive Resize

Thanks for using XD! We update our app regularly to make your experience even better. Every month’s update includes improvements in speed and reliability. In addition to that, this release supports the new features available in the October 2018 (13.0) release of XD.

Thanks for using XD! We update our app regularly to give you the best possible experience. This update includes:
* Support for cloud documents
* Other Voice enhancements

Additionally, every month's update includes improvements in speed and reliability. Let us know what you think!

Thanks for using XD! We update our app regularly to give you the best possible experience. This update includes:

* Shared document notifications
* Ability to use live preview without signing in
* Ability to disable swiping to navigate artboards

Disabling swipe navigation has been a highly requested feature, and we’re glad to get this in your hands! Let us know what you think!

Thanks for using XD! This release is a big one for our desktop app, so it's a big one for us as well. This update includes:
•Support for consuming custom fonts on iOS 13. Install Adobe Fonts on iOS 13 using the Adobe Creative Cloud app, then view them seamlessly in the XD mobile app
•Support for Component States
•Support for Coediting
•Support for Multiple Triggers
Additionally, every month's update includes improvements in speed and reliability. Let us know what you think!
